m_szDocTitle: Fuel Cell Vehicles of 2016: Toyota Mirai vs. Hyundai Tucson
m_szDocSumamry: Fuel Cell Vehicles of 2016: Toyota Mirai vs. Hyundai Tucson Reddit DAMIEN MEYER/AFP/Getty Images Whether America is ready or not, there will be two  fuel cell vehicles available to consumers in 2015. While questions linger about the actual green benefits  of hydrogen cars and just 8 public fueling stations exist in the target markets, Californians have a choice to make if you’re lucky enough to find a fuel cell vehicle on the agenda.
